text: @NYGovCuomo Why are physicians and staff on the frontlines getting pay slashed and hours cut ? How does any of this make sense?  Locums companies in NY are cancelling physician assignments that were confirmed- then NY is asking physicians to volunteer their time.https://t.co/pLWCJv5gWW
